WTB: Rockered powder skis - $300500

(google map) (yahoo map)

I am looking to get an AT setup. Been skiing Rossignol Scratch 195 cm for the past two years which has been decent, but they're just a little too long and stiff for the tight tree skiing I like.

I am looking for a slightly shorter softer ski with LOTS of rocker. I will only be skiing these on back country powder, so I'm not interested in an "all mountain" ski.

Looking for something in the 175-185 cm range with full length rocker. Like Volkl Shiro, Moment Ghost Chant, Black Diamond Gigawatt etc. If you've got something, please send a pic of the skis nested together base to base so I can get an idea.

I'd expect to spend about 250-350 dollars on the skis, but would spend 400-500 if mounted with Marker or Dynafit AT bindings.

Thanks, Cody.

Text or email please.
